section.title: List of &php.ini; directives
section.para: This list includes the &php.ini; directives you can set to configure your PHP setup.
The "Changeable" column shows the modes determining when and where a directive may be set. See the Changeable mode values section for their definitions.

row.entry: Available since PHP 5.2.0. Deprecated as of PHP 7.4.0.
Default to "UTF-8" since PHP >= 5.6.0, empty for PHP < 5.6.0.
Available since PHP 5.1.0. Renamed to zend.detect_unicode since PHP 5.4.0.
PHP_INI_ALL in filter <= 0.9.4. Available since PHP 5.2.0.
PHP_INI_ALL in filter <= 0.9.4. Available since PHP 5.2.0.
Available since pecl_http 0.4.0. Removed in pecl_http 1.0.0.
Available since pecl_http 0.12.0. Removed in pecl_http 1.0.0.
Available since pecl_http 0.8.0. Removed in pecl_http 1.0.0.
Available since pecl_http 0.12.0. Removed in pecl_http 1.0.0.
Available since pecl_http 0.12.0. Removed in pecl_http 1.0.0.
Available since pecl_http 0.21.0. Removed in pecl_http 1.0.0.
Available since pecl_http 0.21.0. Removed in pecl_http 1.0.0.
Available since pecl_http 0.21.0. Removed in pecl_http 1.0.0.
Available since pecl_http 0.21.0. Removed in pecl_http 1.0.0.
Available since pecl_http 0.12.0. Removed in pecl_http 1.0.0.
Deprecated in PHP 5.3.0. Removed in PHP 5.4.0.
Removed in PHP 5.4.0. Use zend.script_encoding instead.
Deprecated in PHP 5.3.0. Removed in PHP 5.4.0.
Deprecated in PHP 5.3.0. Removed in PHP 5.4.0.
Before PHP 5.3.6, the default value was 100. Before PHP 7.1.0, the default value was 17.
PHP_INI_ALL in PHP <= 5.4.19 and in PHP <= 5.5.1.
PHP_INI_SYSTEM in Xdebug <= 1.2.0. Removed in Xdebug 2.0.0.
Available since PHP 5.0.0. Removed in PHP 5.3.0.
